channel.title: Making the Dfs move with your arm
channel.description:
Is there away to make the dfs shield move with your arms when blocking? If so, could someone give me a guide to fixing this. I have used the search bar and google.
Thank You,
SchecterPK

item.title: Making the Dfs move with your arm
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“SchecterPK, post:1, topic:285830”]Is there away to make the dfs shield move with your arms when blocking? If so, could someone give me a guide to fixing this. I have used the search bar and google.

Thank You,

SchecterPK[/quote]
About 95% of server have the DFS model added to the cache so there is no way to acess it. So, if there was a way search class8.java for the model ID’s and search you model folder for those ID’s. If it is not in there then it wont be a possible edit to the DFS. I have that problem with my server and have been trying to find the original one ins RSMV to re-add it with animations.

Read full topic
item.source: Making the Dfs move with your arm
